testcase.name: create new reagent
testcase.system-out: Given user is navigated to website "http://localhost:5050"..................passed Then user is navigated to "login" page......................................passed When user enters username as "admin"........................................passed And user enters password as "admin".........................................passed And user clicks on "SignIn" button..........................................passed Then user is navigated to "Dashboard" page..................................passed When user clicks on menu "Reagent"..........................................passed And user clicks on sub-menu "Library".......................................passed Then user is navigated to "Reagent Library" page............................passed When user clicks on "Create Reagent" button.................................passed Then user is navigated to "Create Reagent" page.............................passed When user type reagent "name" as "Reagent 1"................................passed Then "Reagent 1" is typed on "name" textbox.................................passed When user select "Antibiotic" on "type".....................................passed Then "Antibiotic" is selected on "type".....................................passed When user type reagent "note" as "Create Reagent 1 with Antibiotic".........passed Then "Create Reagent 1 with Antibiotic" is typed on "note" textbox..........passed When user clicks on "Save" button...........................................passed Then new "reagent" item is created with notification "Success" and "Reagent has been created".passed And There is no new "culture reagent" item created..........................passed

testcase.name: create new reagent with create culture reagent
testcase.system-out: Given user is navigated to website "http://localhost:5050"..................passed Then user is navigated to "login" page......................................passed When user enters username as "admin"........................................passed And user enters password as "admin".........................................passed And user clicks on "SignIn" button..........................................passed Then user is navigated to "Dashboard" page..................................passed When user clicks on menu "Reagent"..........................................passed And user clicks on sub-menu "Library".......................................passed Then user is navigated to "Reagent Library" page............................passed When user clicks on "Create Reagent" button.................................passed Then user is navigated to "Create Reagent" page.............................passed When user type reagent "name" as "Reagent 2"................................passed Then "Reagent 2" is typed on "name" textbox.................................passed When user select "Antibiotic" on "type".....................................passed Then "Antibiotic" is selected on "type".....................................passed When user check "create culture reagent" on checkbox........................passed Then checkbox "create culture reagent" is checked...........................passed When user type reagent "note" as "Create Reagent 1 with Antibiotic".........passed Then "Create Reagent 1 with Antibiotic" is typed on "note" textbox..........passed When user clicks on "Save" button...........................................passed Then new "reagent" item is created with notification "Success" and "Reagent has been created".passed And There is new "culture reagent" item created with "100%" composition.....passed
